Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: what time on which TV channel?
First in group F, Bar√ßa receive Slavia Prague for the fourth day of the Champions League. Find out which TV channel and what time to watch this event.
05 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Antoine Chirat



Antoine GriezmannClub previous: Atletico MadridPayment: 120 million eurosIcon Sport



Frenkie De JongClub previous: Ajax AmsterdamCompensation: 75 million eurosIcon Sport



NetoClub previous: ValenciaIndemnity: 26 million eurosIcon Sport



Junior FirpoClub previous: Real BetisIndemnity: 18 million eurosIcon Sport



EmersonClub previous: Atletico MGIndemnity: 12 million eurosIcon Sport



Marc CucurellaClub previous: EibarCompensation: 4 million eurosIcon Sport

Bar√ßa: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




The Champions League is back on your screens and for the fourth day of Group F, Bar√ßa welcomes the little finger of Slavia Prague. First with seven points, the teammates of Lionel Messi can get closer to the qualification in case of victory knowing that at the same time, Inter Milan moves on the lawn of Borussia Dortmund.







Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague to the Champions League




Clement Lenglet + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

As for last season, the Altice group via its subsidiary RMC Sport broadcasts the entire Champions League and Europa League. This match between Bar√ßa and Slavia Prague is broadcast live on television on RMC Sport 2 from 18h55 hrs CET on Tuesday 5th October 2019.



F schedule and results
